section.title: Overview
section.para: This module contains all methods related for usage of Kamailio as a Proxy-CSCF.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para: The Following modules must be loaded before this module:

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para: This module requires the internal IMS library.

section.title: pcscf_uri (string)
section.para: URI of this Proxy-CSCF.

section.title: pending_reg_expires (int)
section.para: How long (in seconds), until pending (uncomplete) Registrations expire

section.title: received_avp (string)
section.para: AVP, holding the received information (optional)

section.title: is_registered_fallback2ip (int)
section.para: Defines, whether a contact should be searched by its Contact: only or alternatively by the received IP-Address.
The option may have the following values:

listitem.para: 1 Search by Contact-Header, if this fails, search by Received Information (IP, Port, Proto)
2 Search by Received Information (IP, Port, Proto), if this fails, Search by Contact Header

section.para: This Parameter is primarily used by the "is_registered" function.

section.title: publish_reginfo (int)
section.para: If set to "1", the module will send PUBLISH regarding changes of the registration (e.g. due to Rx-Information) towards the network core.

para.emphasis: Default value is 0 (Do not send PUBLISH).

section.title: subscribe_to_reginfo (int)
section.para: If set to "1", the module will send a SUBSCRIBE for the registration status towards the network core.

para.emphasis: Default value is 0 (Do not send SUBSCRIBE).

section.title: subscription_expires (int)
section.para: How long should the subscription of reg-info towards the packet-core be valid?

section.title: ignore_contact_rxport_check (int)
section.para: Validate, if the port, from which the request was received, is the same as used during registration.
This Parameter is primarily used by the "is_registered" function.

para.emphasis: Default value is 0 (do not ignore Ports).

section.title: ignore_reg_state (int)
section.para: Validate, if the found contact is really and completely registered.
This Parameter is primarily used by the "is_registered" function.

para.emphasis: Default value is 0 (do not ignore registration state).

section.title: force_icscf_uri (string)
section.para: Instead of doing a DNS-Lookup on the domain, always send the requests to a specific I-CSCF.

para.emphasis: Default value is not set, do the DNS-Lookup.

section.title: reginfo_queue_size_threshold (int)
section.para: As reginfo operations are processed asynchronously, this parameter defines at what length of the queue, the length should be logged (in order to determine overload)

para.emphasis: Default value is 0 (do not log queue length).
